ship.name: Merkhrioch
ship.description: The Roidhunate restricts private access to military crafts much more than the Empire does, and thus it might seem surprising that a ship like the Merkhrioch would ever be cleared for sale outside the Ardar navy; only when the need to develop a network of client states dependent on Ardar support rose did the Roidhunate relent and accept the development of a cruiser available to its allies. The result is a powerful ship indeed, among the most powerful available outside the Imperial and Ardar navies, sales of which are closely monitored.
